channel.title: Server help
channel.description:
I read a tut that might help me get my server up but it asks to copy a IPv4 address in cmd-ipconfig. Also I can't find the DNS address.
Edit: Also I checked my internet properties, and I found a option uncheck in Internet Connection Settings: Allow other networks users to connect through this computer's Internet connection.
So should that option be check to get my server up?

item.title: Server help
item.dc:creator: @bballman28 bballman28
item.description:
@bballman28 wrote:

I read a tut that might help me get my server up but it asks to copy a IPv4 address in cmd-ipconfig. Also I can’t find the DNS address.

Edit: Also I checked my internet properties, and I found a option uncheck in Internet Connection Settings: Allow other networks users to connect through this computer’s Internet connection.

So should that option be check to get my server up?

Read full topic
